text: (Napiye!) Nir kurum; "avarrai vita melanavai parriya ceytiyai nan unkalukkuc collattuma? Takva - payapakti - utaiyavarkalukku, avarkalutaiya iraivanitattil cuvanapatikal untu. Avarrin kil nirotaikal otikkontirukkinrana. Avarkal anku enrenrum tankuvarkal; (anku avarkalukkut) tuya tunaikal untu. Innum allahvin tirup poruttamum untu. Allah tan atiyarkalai urru nokkukiravanaka irukkinran
